snippet.title: Injustice: Gods Among Us Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: What if our greatest heroes became our greatest threat?  Injustice: Gods Among Us is an all-new game by award-winning NetherRealm Studios, creators of the definitive fighting game franchise Mortal Kombat. The game is scheduled for release in 2013 for the Xbox 360® video game and entertainment system from Microsoft, PlayStation®3 computer entertainment system and Wii U™.
